titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bayowet C4.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/18/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on 1-Butanesulfonic Acid, 1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,4- Nonafluoro-Potassium Salt (Bayowet C4).
